meanings.definition: A person who resides in a southern region of a state.
meanings.sent1: Downstaters enjoy the warmer weather in the southern part of the state.
meanings.sent2: Many downstaters prefer living in the southern regions due to the milder climate.
meanings.sent3: The downstaters threw a barbecue party to celebrate the sunny weather.
meanings.sent4: In the state of happiness, downstaters are the ones basking in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The image of downstaters lounging under palm trees is a common sight in the south.

meanings.definition: Those who live in a lower geographical area within a state.
meanings.sent1: Downstaters often have to deal with flooding in the lower regions of the state.
meanings.sent2: The infrastructure in the lower areas is well-maintained by downstaters.
meanings.sent3: During heavy rain, the downstaters in the lowlands have to watch out for rising water levels.
meanings.sent4: The downstaters at the bottom of the state are like the foundation holding everything up.
meanings.sent5: The resilience of downstaters living in the lowlands is truly admirable.
